title: Doctor Who season 14: Release date speculation, cast, and latest news
content:
The future is bright for Doctor Who as we approach the 60th-anniversary specials and what comes next.

The actor, who previously starred as Eric Effiong in Sex Education, was announced as the top name of RadioTimes.com's TV 100 earlier this year, beating a whole host of influential TV stars to the top spot, and it's clear his star is only going to keep shining.

Chatting to RadioTimes.com earlier this year to celebrate the news, Gatwa then gave a very welcome update on how filming for season 14 is going, teasing: "Filming is going great. [It] was a tough start as I was doing Sex Education and Doctor Who at the same time for two months at the beginning.

"But now that Sex Ed is wrapped and I'm just in Doctor, it has been so much fun having full rein to explore and find the character. It truly is the funnest role and the action never stops."

Filming has wrapped on the fourteenth season but the show is already filming its fifteenth season.

Filming officially began for the specials December 2022, with Gatwa set to take over following the 60th anniversary specials, starring David Tennant and Catherine Tate, and helmed by returning showrunner Russell T Davies.

So, when exactly can we expect season 14 of the popular sci-fi show? Read on for everything you need to know.
